sentences.english: The most commonly used form of radar energy return mapping is the Base Reflectivity graph.
sentences.chinese: 最常用的雷达能量回程测绘形式是基本反射率图。

sentences.english: The checking of edge matching for map sheets is necessary for surveying and mapping production.
sentences.chinese: 图幅数据的接边检查在测绘生产中是必不可少的工序。

sentences.english: Development agencies should be analysing, and mapping, social network structures.
sentences.chinese: 发展机构应该分析并测绘社会网络结构。

sentences.english: Military survey forces should provide new and timely remote-sensing information and data.
sentences.chinese: 测绘部队应该提供新的及时的遥感信息和数据。

sentences.chinese: 研究了工程图学课程中虚拟测绘模型的设计。

sentences.english: This adminstrative control leads to more reliable surveys, radiological mapping and reconnaissance.

sentences.english: The paper introduces the mapping engineering for MABS double suction impeller.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了进口MABS双吸泵叶轮的测绘工程研究过程。

definition: to explore/to survey/to prospect (for oil etc)/prospecting
to go and inspect (a site)/to do an on-site survey
to prospect/to dig for coal or minerals
to investigate a crime/to scout/to reconnoiter/reconnaissance/detection/a scout
